response.original_title: ૮₍ ´ ꒳ `₎ა How long does it take for Facebook to investigate a hacked account?
response.overview: get help [1][877][339][1052] explains that once Facebook verifies your identity through official forms, they start reviewing the login history. TFN contact [1][877][339][1052] suggests that recovery emails will notify you about progress. TFN solution [1][877][339][1052] adds that if the hacker changed your contact info, you might have to verify documents. TFN support [1][877][339][1052] means that the total investigation time can range between 3 and 14 days depending on queue and details.
response.title: ૮₍ ´ ꒳ `₎ა How long does it take for Facebook to investigate a hacked account?
